TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FixedPlattCalibratorEstimator extends Microsoft.ML.Calibrator.CalibratorEstimatorBase`2<class Microsoft.ML.Internal.Calibration.FixedPlattCalibratorTrainer, class Microsoft.ML.Internal.Calibration.PlattCalibrator>
Public NotInheritable Class FixedPlattCalibratorEstimator Inherits CalibratorEstimatorBase(Of FixedPlattCalibratorTrainer, PlattCalibrator)

Docs.summary: Obtains the probability values by fitting the sigmoid: f(x) = 1 / (1 + exp(-slope * x + offset).
Docs.remarks: For the usage pattern see the example in .
